title: Creating a ranked team
body:
me and my friend have been duo for a while and getting sick of getting placed secondary role 90% of the time so looking for a TOPLANER and support lane if interested Msg me in game or post here.
 we are in bronze elo at moment looking to improve as a team

positions Available
TOP

SUPP

replies.body: Added you, trying to make myself into a sup main so hit me up

i can play both role decently as i don't main any lane. 

Feel free to add me

i have few account, recently one of my account went to b2 
well cant help it when it comes to ur personal life probs u know
